context: Programmatic click​ | If you are not interested in testing your app under the real conditions and want to simulate the click by any means possible, you can trigger the [`HTMLElement.click()`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/click) behavior via simply dispatching a click event on the element with [locator.dispatchEvent()](/docs/api/class-locator#locator-dispatch-event):
